data.message: Social media is really amazing how it can connect so many. It's amazing how far we've come in 15 years.

replies.message: We couldn't agree more, Billy. Thanks for being part of our community. We appreciate you! -Hailey
Thanks to facebook.  I have a wife and a lot of friends here in the USA and in the philippines.
With Facebook I have made some Fantastic Friends that I would Never have met in person since they live all over the U.S. My life is Enriched and Blessed to have them ALL as Friends!! ❤️

What a great story, Hel! We love to hear interesting stories like yours and hear more about your experience with Facebook. If you’re interested in submitting this story to Facebook Stories, you can do so at: http://www.facebookstories.com/yourstory. -Sarah
